attributes.review: I’ve downloaded this app in hopes of finding out good things about the president but he is feeding us lies and pulling us out of the WHO why would he do that with the whole corona virus going on. He won’t wear a mask. He is a white supremacist and he won’t give the lgbtq communities simple HUMAN RIGHTS. Outrageous this man is. I’m disappointed to be and American with this man as president 😤.
attributes.title: Garbage

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see if there are reasons to vote for Trump in November, and don’t hold your breath because there are no reasons. Furthermore, this app made my phone glitch out an explode because it couldn’t take all the lies and stupid stuff that this racist, rapist “president” has done... Anyways 0/10 would NOT recommend.
attributes.title: Disgusting 🤢

attributes.review: Oh god... this app is just horrible. First my phone started to act up and there was this Icon on the corner of my screen it almost looked like they were watching and recording my screen. Seriously Donald is up to something and it’s not good. Honestly this app should get banned taken off from the appstore
attributes.title: Ugh worst appp

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and not only did It take FOREVER but It came with a virus ! 😭 if i could give this app 1 star, I would. This app not only kept my phone glitching but also ended up making my phone EXPLODE and I had to get a new one... here’s the worst part, IT TRANSFERRED TO MY NEW PHONE and did the same thing. STAY AWAY FROM THIS APP !!!
attributes.title: Don’t waste your time

attributes.review: All i wanted was to keep up with the 2020 campaign for Trump, but i was met with relentless ads. Just because i want to be informed doesn't  mean i have to give up my personal information too! I would NOT recommend downloading this app! I believe this was set up by liberals to confuse us Trump supporters! This app is FAKE NEWS!!!!!
attributes.title: This app is terrible

attributes.review: This is one of the worst apps I have ever ran into. Apple should be a shamed of themselves to have this on the App Store. I got no correct information out of this app. It took days to download and it would freeze constantly and I would have to turn off my phone and turn it back on.
attributes.title: Bad app

attributes.review: When I opened this app my phone crashed. It took me days to try and get my phone back on. And then finally after getting my phone to work again,  I tried deleting the app and all it did was play the national anthem on repeat for hours. Worse app ever. Corrupt app and Government
attributes.title: Crashing

attributes.review: i was shocked, in tears almost when i opened the app and saw a hot cheeto puff staring at me 👁👄👁 so i was like okay well maybe if i read some stuff i’ll like it and so i did, hear me out🦻it made me gag 😹 like what is dis honey, make it make sense sweetie 😺 all these karen’s mad doe 😡 so i was like i’ll give it a one star to BOIL THEIR BLOOD 🩸 i wish i could rate it a no star❤️ anyways ALL APPS MATTER 😁
attributes.title: no ❤️

attributes.review: ⬆️that’s where this app belongs. Because that’s how the people who support it treat others outside of their supremacist group. I also had to throw my phone out after downloading this app because I felt ashamed it ever existed on my phone. It made all my other apps retarded because it spread false information and dumb💩.
attributes.title: 🗑 trash

attributes.review:
this app is spreading lies. it says it has the latest news but has a bias and seems like we’re going back in time. there are no morals and i believe the reason for having this app is useless. i don’t support a president who doesn’t care about all of his citizens and hides from real problems. this app is a waste of storage and a waste of time.
it is clear that with an age rating on 17+ this app is trying to trick innocent people into voting for someone who lies. also someone who retweeted a video saying white power. this app is a lie and should never be used.
attributes.title: full of lies
